title: About Pietro's Restaurant - Pietro's Restaurant
text: ABOUT A BIT OF HISTORY Pietro’s Restaurant started in 1960 as a small family operated bar and dining establishment with two employees. Through several expansions it has evolved into a restaurant and banquet facility that can accommodate up to 120 people. Still family owned, Pietro’s is known for serving generations of families, with quality meals at reasonable prices. QUICK FACTS 0 + YEARS IN BUSINESS 0 STAR RATING ON FACEBOOK 0 + 5 STAR REVIEWS
